body_html:
Well the build timed out before reaching the one_hot_op_test.py. :(

@gunan Any ideas for how to make it run longer? I also made a similar change to the MatrixDiag ops and diag_op_test.py has failed, but when I look in the workspace at the testing log, I don't see any errors.... Is it maybe failing because it's not using the GPU (e.g. because of some smarts put in to ensure that we're actually testing GPU implementations)?

body:
Well the build timed out before reaching the `one_hot_op_test.py`. :(

@gunan Any ideas for how to make it run longer? I also made a similar change to the MatrixDiag ops and `diag_op_test.py` has failed, but when I look in the workspace at the testing log, I don't see any errors.... Is it maybe failing because it's not using the GPU (e.g. because of some smarts put in to ensure that we're actually testing GPU implementations)?
